getMaxValue().Description: Return the max value which is typically size of parent visible area, e.g. RecyclerView's height if we are tracking Y position of a child. The size can be used to calculate marker value using the provided fraction of FloatPropertyMarkerValue.

Returns: Currently RecylerView that the source has registered onScrollListener.

Parameters: int: Index of the property in this Parallax object.
createProperty(java.lang.String, int).Description: Create a new Property object. App does not directly call this method. See @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#Parallax#addProperty_E@.

updateValues().Description: Manually update values. This is used for changes not controlled by RecyclerView. E.g. called by a Slide transition that changes translation of the view.

ClassDesc: Implementation of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#Parallax_E@ class for @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView_E@. This class allows users to track position of specific views inside @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView_E@ relative to itself. @see @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#RecyclerViewParallax#ChildPositionProperty_E@ for details.
